mapper.sql: SELECT REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, USER_NO AS userNo, CONTENT_ID AS contentId, CONTENT AS content, CREATED_TIME AS createdTime, MODIFIED_TIME AS modifiedTime, STATUS AS status
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO, USER_NO, CONTENT_ID, CONTENT, CREATED_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, POINT, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{contentId}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{point}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE 1=1 AND CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET CONTENT = #{content}, POINT = #{point}, MODIFIED_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT RI.FILE_URL FROM TB_REVIEW R JOIN TB_REVIEW_IMG RI ON R.REVIEW_NO = RI.REVIEW_NO WHERE R.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO
SELECT FILE_URL FROM TB_REVIEW_IMG WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.USER_NO, R.CONTENT_ID, R.CONTENT, R.CREATED_TIME, R.MODIFIED_TIME, R.STATUS, R.POINT, I.FILE_URL, U.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME FROM TB_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW_IMG I ON R.REVIEW_NO = I.REVIEW_NO LEFT JOIN TB_USER U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.USER_NO, R.CONTENT_ID, R.CONTENT, R.CREATED_TIME, R.MODIFIED_TIME, R.STATUS, R.POINT, I.FILE_URL, U.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME FROM TB_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW_IMG I ON R.REVIEW_NO = I.REVIEW_NO LEFT JOIN TB_USER U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
SELECT NVL(AVG(POINT), 0) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
